name: Brex
description: Integrate with Brex to list, list, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Transactions
tools.description: List Brex card transactions. Optionally filter by date range or user. Returns transaction descriptions, amounts, and dates.

tools.name: List Cards
tools.description: List Brex cards. Optionally filter by user or card status. Returns card details including last four digits and limits.

tools.name: List Users
tools.description: List users (employees) in Brex. Returns user names, emails, roles, and statuses.

tools.name: Get Account
tools.description: Get Brex account details including the primary cash account balance and status.

tools.name: List Vendors
tools.description: List vendors (payment recipients) in Brex. Returns vendor names, payment methods, and IDs.
